title: Salmon fillets with herb sauce, quails' eggs and asparagus
description: I love to serve a long platter of these salmon fillets for a summer buffet. They look so pretty and the flavour of the herb sauce really compliments the salmon. This would be the prefect main meal to serve for a special occasion.
ingredients: 10 x 125g/4½oz single fillets of salmon, cut from the whole fillet, skin on
